entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 9:35PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Rivers Rising Rapidly Tonight... Strong thunderstorms over the Eastern Brooks Range are causing areas of heavy rain tonight, along with frequent lightning. This rain will cause sharp rises in creeks and small rivers in the Eastern Brooks Range tonight, with larger rivers rising rapidly Friday into this weekend in the Eastern Brooks Range.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Southeastern Brooks Range
